item.title: Push-To-Talk (PTT) Switches – Flightcrew Audio Selector Panel PTT Switches

numlitem.para: Associated control wheel or glareshield PTT switch is operative, and
Affected switch is verified failed open.

note.para: Use PTT on Control Wheel (upper or lower as required).

placard.para: Placard affected Panel PTT switch "PTT SW INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Provide electrical power on the aircraft.
Select BOOM on the ASP and use the boom microphone for this test.
Push the INT SELECT switch on the associated ASP, ensure the INT MIC light is illuminated and receiver volume is properly adjusted.

Speak into the boom microphone while simultaneously pushing the associated ASP PTT switch. No transmission should be heard on the other pilot’s headset. This verifies the associated ASP PTT switch is failed open.
